questions_start: ^Oh this was an incredible trip, but it’s also the most scared I’ve ever been in my life! Do you remember where we took this picture?
^This is so frustrating, this picture looks like nothing to me.

b: ^Oh I remember this place having very good wine… but why can’t I remember where it is?
^It's starting to feel a little more familar...

c-0: ^That’s an animal, Honey. We saw it from the jeep we were in.
c-1: ^Well, that animal had just walked past the jeep. The guide said that they usually ignore humans, so I wasn’t expecting it when it roared and took off running right as it was passing by! I nearly jumped out of my skin!
c-2: ^The kids were the reason why we took the trip in the first place! Adam was 10 and was obsessed with Simba.

holdingKnot: ^Okay Honey, do you know where this photo was taken?
correctAnswer: ^That’s right, South Africa! After Adam saw the Lion King he insisted that we go on a safari to see real-life lions. Kristen was a little older and pouted for the first half of the trip, but as soon as she saw the lions and elephants, she was immediately obsessed. She says it was this trip that inspired her to get into nature photography: she’s the one who took this picture!
^I knew it was South Africa! And I remember drinking really good wine there too.
^Yes! For years after this trip, you would only buy South African wines.
incorrectAnswer: ^Oh, sorry Honey, that picture was taken in South Africa. After Adam saw the Lion King he insisted that we go on a safari to see real-life lions. Kristen was a little older and pouted for the first half of the trip, but as soon as she saw the lions and elephants, she was immediately obsessed.
^She says it was this trip that inspired her to get into nature photography: she’s the one who took this picture!
^I remember Adam is my son… but who is Kristen? My daughter’s name is Diane.
